name: Blue Ridge Cyclery
desc: Blue Ridge Cyclery, with their two locations on Preston Ave. and Hollymead Town Center in Charlottesville, is our long-time partner, providing the club with great deals on bikes, parts, and service. The owner, Shawn Tevendale, also provides access to his private mountain bike trails for the Junior Mountain Bike Team practices, as well as the Beaver Blitz and Paranormal MTB races.

name: Reynolds GM-Subaru
desc: Reynolds GM-Subaru is our major title sponsor. The owner, John Reynolds, is a cycling and a long-time supporter of the club.

name: Shenandoah Joe
desc: Shenandoah Joe is a long-running partner of CRC through our Spin-a-Thon for Toy Lift Charities, making some of the best coffee in Charlottesville. Check them out at their various locations in town and at the Charlottesville Farmer's Market from April to December.

name: Wintergreen Resort
desc: Wintergreen Resort is one of the largest ski resorts in the Blue Ridge Mountains southwest of Charlottesville, and has hosted the CRC Jim Beazell Wintergreen Ascent for many years. It hosted a stage finish in the 1992 Tour Dupont, as one of the most difficult climbs in Virginia.

name: Rockfish Brewing Co.
desc: Rockfish Brewing Co. is our go-to spot for beer after club rides in Charlottesville. Located on Preston Ave., we drop by after every Tuesday Night Worlds from mid-March until the end of October.

name: Castle Hill Cider
desc: Castle Hill Cider in Keswick, Virginia is not only a great cidery, but also a top-notch event venue. They host our annual Castle Hill CX in November.

name: Cutaway USA
desc: Based here in Charlottesville, Cutaway USA is a high-end cycling apparel company. Cutaway designs our awesome kits as well as the famous Tuesday Night Worlds jersey.

name: Formula Fitness
desc: Formula Fitness, located adjacent to Preston Ave., improves your strength, stamina, and function with its individualized, scientific approach to running. They're a valuable resource to our triathlon team.

name: Skyline Tent Company
desc: For the past fifteen years Skyline Tent Company has built an award-winning reputation as the leading provider for specialty tenting and large flooring projects throughout the Southeast and beyond. Skyline Tent Company provides tents for CRC races.
